metadata.title: Can Okta's (OKTA) Industry Recognition and AI Push Strengthen Its Competitive Moat?
metadata.description: Okta was recognized as a Leader in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Access Management for the ninth consecutive year and introduced new Auth0 Platform capabilities to support secure AI agent development and identity security fabric advancements. This recognition reinforces Okta's reputation for innovation at a time when organizations are seeking unified identity solutions for increasingly complex, AI-driven security needs. We'll take a look at how Okta's AI-focused product enhancements...
